name: LexTalk World Global Legal & IP New York 2024
content: The 7th edition of the LexTalk World Global Legal & IP Conference will take place in New York on November 14th, 2024\. This conference will gather over 300 Legal, IP, and Technology leaders following successful events in Dubai, Singapore, and New Delhi. The event will feature two halls focusing on Legal & Tech and IP & Tech, covering topics like Governance, Risk, and Compliance (GRC), White-Collar Crime, Cybersecurity, Global IP Strategies, and Patent Law. This is a unique opportunity for professionals to discuss current trends and future insights in these critical areas.
